how_many_times.message: How many times should I scroll?

extension_description.message: Extension for scrolling websites with a lazy-load technology used (when you scroll up/down to get new records/items/news)

browser_action.message: To use this extension - just press your right mouse button anywhere on the page and select a scrolling option

donate.message: If you like this app - you can support author by donate (app is free and open source)
